original_text: So David's friend Hushai arrived at Jerusalem at the same time that Absalom was coming into the city.
korean_text: 다윗의 친구 후새가 곧 성읍으로 들어가고 압살롬도 예루살렘으로 들어갔더라

sentences.original_text: So David's friend Hushai arrived at Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 다윗의 친구 후새가 예루살렘에 도착했습니다

sentences.original_text: that Absalom was coming into the city
